hy.text:
Configuration for https://turbowarp.org/
You can move, resize, and minimize this comment, but don't edit it by hand. This comment can be deleted to remove the stored settings.
{"framerate":60,"runtimeOptions":{"fencing":false},"width":640} // _twconfig_

TEXT: Green prefers to shoot in the center.
Blue prefers to shoot on the edges.
Purple hates being able to see Yellow.
Red hates Green, Yellow, and Blue.
